titles: A pious and seasonable persvvasive to the sonnes of Zion soveraignely usefull for composing their unbrotherly devisions. By a Lover of the Truth, and all those that live godly in Christ Jesus.
notes: Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 11th 1646"; the '7' in the imprint has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Religious aspects --  Early works to 1800.
